    • Constructor Detail

      • Downloadable

        public Downloadable(java.lang.String downloadUrl,
            java.lang.String sizeUrl,
            java.lang.String filename,
            java.lang.String dir)
        will commence the threaded download after taking required info
        Parameters:
        downloadUrl - Url to the file to download
        sizeUrl - Url to file containing download file size, or integer of the size
        filename - Filename with extension
        dir - The directory the file will be downloaded to (use / instead of \)
